title: Charmed - Season 1 to 8 - Mp4 480ip
description:
Charmed - Season 1 to 8 - Mp4 Dvdrip
------------------------------------

Codec Info:
-----------
Video Codec: AVC Mp4   
Resolution: 720 x 480 (4:3 Aspect Ratio)
Frame Rate: 30 fps
Video Bit Rate: 1230 kbps (2pass)

Audio Codec: AAC
Audio Bit Rate: 192 kbps
Sampling Rate: 48 kHz
Channels: 2 (Stereo)

Description:
------------
This is the complete series.
No adjustment has been made to the originals, except for
converting them to Mp4 instead of the original Mpg.
Thus the files are of extremely good
quality at only a quarter of the size.
Also, please note that because this is a Dvdrip some of
the episodes are INTERLACED while others are PROGRESSIVE.
This means that if you are playing them back
on a PC using a media player (I recommend VLC)
you will need to turn DEINTERLACING ON.
Alternatively, and for even better quality, I recommend
playing them using a Bluray player on a 1080p HDTV.
Long live the Charmed Ones! ;)

written by a Vancouver writer... :)
